column1: Principal Skinner,"Hello, Simpson. I'm riding the bus today becuase Mother hid my car keys to punish me for talking to a woman on the phone. She was right to do it."

column2: Nothing you say can upset us. We're the MTV generation.

column1: Comic Book Guy,"Last night's 'Itchy and Scratchy' was, without a doubt, the worst episode ever. Rest assured that I was on the Internet within minutes, registering my disgust throughout the world."

column2: But my mom says I'm cool.
